screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 20) wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] if (64 > wsizey): wsizey = 64 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: wsizey += 60 if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex, 50) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (55, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (15, 0), size = (0, 0), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (15, 0), size = (50, 55), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (75, 0), size = (150, 55), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (235, 0), size = (385, 55), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (630, 0), size = (20, 55), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (55, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (15, 0), size = (0, 0), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (15, 0), size = (50, 55), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (75, 0), size = (150, 55), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (235, 0), size = (385, 55), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (630, 0), size = (20, 55), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22), gFont("Regular", 22)], "itemHeight": 55 }

skin.screen: SkyQDate {"templates": {"default": (95,[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (0, 0), size = (100, 75), png = 4), # index 4 is the thumbnail MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120, 0), size = (900, 28), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 1), # index 1 is the Title MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (0, 0), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 5), # index 5 is the Published Date MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120, 40), size = (350, 22), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 6), # index 6 is the Views Count MultiContentEntryText(pos = (500, 40), size = (350, 22), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 7), # index 7 is the duration MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (0, 0), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 8), # index 8 is the ratingcount ]), "state": (95,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (900, 28), font=2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 30), size = (900, 60), font=3, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 1), # index 2 is the description ]) }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20),gFont("Regular", 18),gFont("Regular", 20),gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 95 } # fake entry for dynamic thumbnail resizing, currently there is no other way doing this.

screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 20) wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] if (64 > wsizey): wsizey = 64 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: wsizey += 60 if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex, 50) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))
